tasks.check: deno fmt --check && deno lint && (find routes islands components utils -type f \( -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' \) -print0 | /usr/bin/xargs -0 -n 50 deno check) && deno check dev.ts fresh.config.ts fresh.gen.ts main.ts
tasks.tailwind:build: deno run -A npm:tailwindcss@3.4.17 -c tailwind.config.cjs -i styles/tailwind.css -o static/styles.css --minify
tasks.tailwind:watch: deno run -A npm:tailwindcss@3.4.17 -c tailwind.config.cjs -i styles/tailwind.css -o static/styles.css --watch
tasks.start: deno run -A npm:concurrently@9.1.2 -k -n tailwind,fresh "deno task tailwind:watch" "deno run -A --unstable-kv --watch=static/,routes/,islands/,components/,styles/ dev.ts"
tasks.preview: deno task build && deno run -A --unstable-kv main.ts
